home.whatIsBolaoDesc: In Brazil, a bolão is a betting pool between friends around soccer championships. It's very popular during the World Cup and major tournaments. This app makes it easy to create and manage your own - no money involved, just friendly competition!
home.step1Desc: Start a new bolão for any supported league or join one with an invite link.
home.step2Desc: Predict match results before they start. Update anytime before kickoff.
home.step3Desc: Watch the leaderboard update as matches finish. See who reigns supreme!
home.featureLeaguesDesc: Major soccer leagues supported with automatic fixture updates
home.featureEverywhereDesc: No app to download - works on any device with a browser
home.featureFreeDesc: No subscriptions, no hidden costs, no money involved
home.featureRealtimeDesc: Scores and standings refresh automatically as games end
home.createFirstBolao: Create your first bolão in minutes.

about.title: About
about.bolaoDesc1: In Brazil, a bolão is a betting pool between friends usually around soccer championships. It is very popular during the World Cup and other major tournaments. For the pronunciation check this
about.bolaoDesc2: We started around 2016 doing them on a piece of paper and I decided to try a digital solution. It does not involve money even if most friends like to agree on a prize for the winner. But that's something the app does not deal with.
about.bolaoDesc3: After much research of existing solutions, I came to the reality that none of them was what I expected in terms of UX, design and functionality. That's when I started writing code, around 2017. The app has been growing ever since, fixing mistakes, going through massive updates and design changes. This very version you are on is the major 3, or the third big iteration of the application.
about.whoDesc: This is a one person project. My name is Kevin and I'm a software developer and former web designer living in Rio de Janeiro - Brazil. If you really want to know more about me, head to
about.techDesc1: As stated before, this is a web app, which means no Android or iOS extra app to download. Just open your browser at https://bolao.io. This allows me to constantly roll out changes without the users having to update their native apps.
about.techDesc2: The app is built with NextJS, Typescript and React, hosted at Vercel and uses Postgres for the database. It uses Prismic.io for the headless CMS and Clerk for the auth management.
about.coverageDesc: The app uses the API of <apiLink>api-football.com</apiLink> to get the latest fixtures and results. For now just a handful of leagues are available, but upon request more could be added. Feel free to reach me at <linkedinLink>LinkedIn</linkedinLink>.
